00032 struct lrs2249 {
00033   BOOL enabled;
00034   int crate;
00035   int slot;
00036   char odb_name[20];
00037   char bank_name[20];
00038 };
00039 
00040 #define MAX_LRS2249 8
00041 struct lrs2249 lrs2249[MAX_LRS2249];
00042 
00043 #define N_CH_ADC 12
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * lrs2249_bor1
00047  *
00048  * Initialize one LRS2249 module.
00049  */
00050 INT lrs2249_bor1(struct lrs2249 *adc)
00051 {
00052   // Get the address of the module
00053   adc->crate = odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/Crate",
00054                     crate_number, adc->odb_name);
00055   adc->slot = odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/%s/Slot",
00056                     crate_number, adc->odb_name);
00057 
00058   cam_init_once();
00059 
00060   camc(adc->crate, adc->slot, 0, 9);
00061 
00062   return SUCCESS;
00063 }
00064                                                                                 
00065 /*
00066  * lrs2249_bor
00067  *
00068  * Called at the beginning of the run to discover LRS2249 modules
00069  * and initialize them.
00070  */
00071 INT lrs2249_bor()
00072 {
00073   // Use the ODB to find any LRS2249 modules
00074   for(int j = 0; j < MAX_LRS2249; j++) {
00075  
00076     bool enabled = false;
00077                                                                                 
00078     if (odb_find_key("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/LRS2249 %d", crate_number, j)) {
00079       diag_print(1, "ODB says LRS2249 %d is present, ", j);
00080       enabled =
00081         odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/LRS2249 %d/enabled status",
00082             crate_number, j);
00083       if (enabled) {
00084         diag_print(1, "and is enabled.  Initializing...\n");
00085       } else {
00086         diag_print(1, "but is disabled.\n");
00087       }
00088     }
00089                                                                                 
00090     lrs2249[j].enabled = enabled;
00091                                                                                 
00092     // Set up the name of the MIDAS bank associated with the module
00093     sprintf(lrs2249[j].bank_name, "LAD%d", j);
00094     sprintf(lrs2249[j].odb_name, "LRS2249 %d", j);
00095                                                                                 
00096     if(enabled) {
00097       lrs2249_bor1(&lrs2249[j]);
00098     }
00099   }
00100  
00101   return SUCCESS;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*
00105  * lrs2249_read1
00106  *
00107  * Constructs the MIDAS bank for a single LRS2249.
00108  */
00109 INT lrs2249_read1(struct lrs2249 *adc, char *pevent)
00110 {
00111   // Check whether the ADC has converted; if not, skip it
00112   INT q;
00113   camc_q(adc->crate, adc->slot, 0, 8, &q);
00114   if(!q) return SUCCESS;
00115    
00116   // Create the MIDAS bank
00117   WORD *pdata;
00118   bk_create(pevent, adc->bank_name, TID_WORD, &pdata);
00119 
00120   // Read ADC
00121   for(int i = 0; i < N_CH_ADC; i++) {
00122     cami(adc->crate, adc->slot, i, 0, pdata++);
00123   }
00124 
00125   // Clear ADC
00126   camc(adc->crate, adc->slot, 0, 9);
00127 
00128   // Close the bank
00129   bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00130 
00131   return SUCCESS;
00132 }
00133 
00134 /*
00135  * lrs2249_read
00136  *
00137  * Called at the end of a block to assemble data from that block into a 
00138  * MIDAS event.
00139  */
00140 INT lrs2249_read(char *pevent)
00141 {
00142   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_LRS2249; i++) {
00143     if(lrs2249[i].enabled) {
00144       int status = lrs2249_read1(&lrs2249[i], pevent);
00145        if(status != SUCCESS) {
00146          return status;
00147        }
00148     }
00149   }
00150 
00151   return SUCCESS;
00152 }
